alert.note: Alert for Central Willamette Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 8:31AM PST until December 24 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: Added Central Willamette Valley (ORZ007) ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Areas of freezing rain. Total ice accumulation of a light glaze to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Central Willamette Valley. * WHEN...Until noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will slowly warm throughout the day. Even as temperatures climb above freezing, travel may still be difficult due to slush as snow and ice slowly melt off the roads.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
